metadata.name: Shizoku - The Family of Death
metadata.description:
Fearing that their control over the Outskirts was slipping away, the Defenders Of Fiat contracted with a ruthless gang called the Shizoku - the Family of Death. Led by Shiyuki, the daughter of a fabled Yakuza villain known only as the Samurai, the Shizoku embodied their name by showing no mercy to anyone they were hired to extinguish, including Satoshiâ€™s followers.

Coloring by Ross Campbell.
